|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WN851N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = D |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002d |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = 0300 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TE7WN851ND |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9227; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2052500279" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The '''TP-LINK''' drivers reference two devices... *'''168c:002d (168c:0300) <small>([http://askubuntu.com/questions/90077/ndiswrapper-driver-loaded-but-not-being-used appears to be used])</small>''' **<small>'''TP-LINK 300Mbps Wireless N Adapter'''</small> *168c:002d (168c:0301) **<small>'''TP-LINK 150Mbps Wireless N Adapter'''</small> **This is the PCI ID for the [[TP-LINK TL-WN751ND]].
Per TP-LINK, this device uses AR9227.
Possible F4:EC:38 OUI
